data.htmlContent: Let's be real, you go to Olive Garden for the PASTA. ğŸ It's the ultimate comfort food, and their menu is a playground of creamy, cheesy, saucy goodness. Whether you're a fan of the classics or want to build your own masterpiece, the pasta possibilities are endless. Let's dive in! âœ¨

CREATE YOUR OWN PASTA.description: Don't let them tell you what to do! Be your own pasta artist. Choose your pasta, sauce, and toppings to create the dish of your dreams. ğŸ¨

CLASSIC PASTA ENTRÃ‰ES.description: These are the legends! The tried-and-true pasta dishes that everyone loves. You can't go wrong with any of these. ğŸ†

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.review: The GOAT of pasta dishes. Creamy, cheesy, and oh-so-satisfying. It's famous for a reason. ğŸ’¯

items.question: Can I really create my own pasta at Olive Garden?
items.answer: YES! The 'Create Your Own Pasta' option is the ultimate game-changer. You pick the pasta, the sauce, and the toppings. Go wild!

items.question: Are there gluten-free pasta options?
items.answer: You bet! Olive Garden offers gluten-free rotini pasta. Just let your server know, and they'll hook you up with a delicious gluten-sensitive meal.

items.question: Do pasta dishes come with breadsticks and salad?
items.answer: Of course! It wouldn't be Olive Garden without unlimited breadsticks and your choice of their famous house salad or a soup. It's all included with your entrÃ©e. ğŸ™Œ
